attributes.action: Discuss reform of the BBC, it's editorial integrity & political impartiality
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC's coverage of Brexit, the US election and treatment of President Trump has highlighted the constant contravening of it's own editorial standards:
 
1.2.1 Trust
1.2.2 Truth and Accuracy
1.2.3 Impartiality
1.2.4 Editorial Integrity and Independence

Licence fees generated from the British public provide this organisation £3.75bn per year.   This should not go towards funding a political bias and selectivity on news items that do not appear to serve the BBC's own political agenda.
attributes.background: We request parliament urgently review whether the BBC has compromised it's charter, is fit for purpose and to look into it's political leanings and agenda. A tipping point for the organisation was the President of the United States calling out the organisation for it's political impartiality.
